title: Research Topic: Google Project Maven Employee Resistance: 4,000 Workers Force Pentagon Contract Abandonment (2018)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Google Project Maven Employee Resistance: 4,000 Workers Force Pentagon Contract Abandonment (2018)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the successful resistance by nearly 4,000 Google employees against Project Maven, the company's $15 million Pentagon contract to develop AI for analyzing drone footage, establishing crucial p... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
